sen.e: In 1562, he put his colleague to the sword and ran away, but after Mikawa Ikko Ikki (an uprising of Ikko sect followers in Mikawa Province) broke out, he was allowed to return to the service and helped suppressing the uprising.

sen.j: 永禄11年（1568年）の織田信長の上洛では、織田氏への援軍の将として参戦し、六角氏の蓑作城攻めで武功を挙げた。
sen.e: In 1568, when Nobunaga ODA went to the capital (Kyoto), he joined the battle as a commander of reinforcement of the Oda clan, and rendered distinguished military service in the attack on Mitsukuri-jo Castle of the Rokkaku clan.
